paragraph: Masaki Okada (岡田 将生, Okada Masaki, born August 15, 1989 in Tokyo) is a Japanese actor. He is best known for his roles as Sekime Kyogo in the drama Hanazakari no Kimitachi e and as Takuma Kakinouchi in the 2009 film I Give My First Love to You.
The Foreign Duck, the Native Duck and God in a Coin Locker (2007)
I Give My First Love to You, as Takuma Kakinouchi (2009)
Antoki no Inochi (2011), as Kyohei Nagashima
